checks.name: OPush Database Definition Check
checks.description: Checks that the database contains the proper mappings between domains and OPush hosts.

checks.name: OPush Connection Check
checks.description: Checks that the OPush server(s) are up and running.

checks.name: Opush Folder Sync Check
checks.description: Checks that a simple folder sync scenario runs on opush service

checks.name: Opush Encoding Check
checks.description: Checks that the file encoding is properly configured.
